about me

My name is Pantelis, I live in Greece and Im a student In the Ionian University. In
my free time Im making scripts and mechanics for games in Unity Engine. I scetch figures and
making game characters. I also play video games. My goal is to combine the things
I enjoy the most, Design and Coding. Thats why Im interested in domains like Game Development,
Website Development, Software Design and Character Illustration.

Worked For

  • Public (2019)

    The summer of 2019, I worked as a salesman in the branch store of Corfu.

  • Battlenet (2018)

    The summer of 2018 I worked in the internet cafe chain battlenet.
